@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Publishes a new release of the package on GitHub, by executing the following steps:

  1. In Manifest.json, update the qooxdoo-range value to include the version of the qooxdoo framework (As per package.json).
  2. In Manifest.json, based the given options, increment the version number (patch, feature, breaking).
  3. Create a release with the tag vX.Y.Z according to the current version.
  4. Add "qooxdoo-package" to the list of GitHub topics.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates a qooxdoo.json file with paths to Manifest.json files in this repository

@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
